thread.title: Location and staff friendliness made this place stand out
thread.title_full: Location and staff friendliness made this place stand out - Review of Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Trang T
title: Location and staff friendliness made this place stand out
text: We came here for anniversary. The manager gave us the recognition that made our trip unforgettable. The location is very close to Times square, very convenience. People there recognized us and greeted us with personal care. Love this place.
